sqlMap.select:
select id, order_sn, order_source, shipping_fee, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, paid_amount, reward_integration, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, zip_code, phone, if_invoice, invoice_title, tax, remark, payment_id, delivery_id, member_id, coupon_id, is_push, push_time, delete_status, order_status, order_amount, payable_amount, order_type, return_type, create_date, verify_status, invoice_type, finish_date, longitude, latitude, store_id from t_order
order by $orderByClause$

select id, order_sn, order_source, shipping_fee, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, paid_amount, reward_integration, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, zip_code, phone, if_invoice, invoice_title, tax, remark, payment_id, delivery_id, member_id, coupon_id, is_push, push_time, delete_status, order_status, order_amount, payable_amount, order_type, return_type, create_date, verify_status, invoice_type, finish_date, longitude, latitude, store_id from t_order where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_order (id, order_sn, order_source, shipping_fee, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, paid_amount, reward_integration, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, zip_code, phone, if_invoice, invoice_title, tax, remark, payment_id, delivery_id, member_id, coupon_id, is_push, push_time, delete_status, order_status, order_amount, payable_amount, order_type, return_type, create_date, verify_status, invoice_type, finish_date, longitude, latitude, store_id) values (#id:BIGINT#, #orderSn:VARCHAR#, #orderSource:INTEGER#, #shippingFee:DECIMAL#, #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, #useIntegration:INTEGER#, #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, #paidAmount:DECIMAL#, #rewardIntegration:INTEGER#, #receiver:VARCHAR#, #areaId:BIGINT#, #areaName:VARCHAR#, #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, #zipCode:VARCHAR#, #phone:VARCHAR#, #ifInvoice:INTEGER#, #invoiceTitle:VARCHAR#, #tax:DECIMAL#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #paymentId:BIGINT#, #deliveryId:BIGINT#, #memberId:BIGINT#, #couponId:BIGINT#, #isPush:INTEGER#, #pushTime:TIMESTAMP#, #deleteStatus:INTEGER#, #orderStatus:INTEGER#, #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, #payableAmount:DECIMAL#, #orderType:INTEGER#, #returnType:INTEGER#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #verifyStatus:INTEGER#, #invoiceType:INTEGER#, #finishDate:TIMESTAMP#, #longitude:VARCHAR#, #latitude:VARCHAR#, #storeId:VARCHAR#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

sqlMap.update:
update t_order
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
order_sn = #record.orderSn:VARCHAR#
order_source = #record.orderSource:INTEGER#
shipping_fee = #record.shippingFee:DECIMAL#
promotional_discount = #record.promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#
coupon_discount = #record.couponDiscount:DECIMAL#
integration_discount = #record.integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#
use_integration = #record.useIntegration:INTEGER#
adjust_amount = #record.adjustAmount:DECIMAL#
paid_amount = #record.paidAmount:DECIMAL#
reward_integration = #record.rewardIntegration:INTEGER#
receiver = #record.receiver:VARCHAR#
area_id = #record.areaId:BIGINT#
area_name = #record.areaName:VARCHAR#
detailed_address = #record.detailedAddress:VARCHAR#
zip_code = #record.zipCode:VARCHAR#
phone = #record.phone:VARCHAR#
if_invoice = #record.ifInvoice:INTEGER#
invoice_title = #record.invoiceTitle:VARCHAR#
tax = #record.tax:DECIMAL#
remark = #record.remark:VARCHAR#
payment_id = #record.paymentId:BIGINT#
delivery_id = #record.deliveryId:BIGINT#
member_id = #record.memberId:BIGINT#
coupon_id = #record.couponId:BIGINT#
is_push = #record.isPush:INTEGER#
push_time = #record.pushTime:TIMESTAMP#
delete_status = #record.deleteStatus:INTEGER#
order_status = #record.orderStatus:INTEGER#
order_amount = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#
payable_amount = #record.payableAmount:DECIMAL#
order_type = #record.orderType:INTEGER#
return_type = #record.returnType:INTEGER#
create_date = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#
verify_status = #record.verifyStatus:INTEGER#
invoice_type = #record.invoiceType:INTEGER#
finish_date = #record.finishDate:TIMESTAMP#
longitude = #record.longitude:VARCHAR#
latitude = #record.latitude:VARCHAR#
store_id = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#

update t_order set id = #record.id:BIGINT#, order_sn = #record.orderSn:VARCHAR#, order_source = #record.orderSource:INTEGER#, shipping_fee = #record.shippingFee:DECIMAL#, promotional_discount = #record.promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, coupon_discount = #record.couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, integration_discount = #record.integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, use_integration = #record.useIntegration:INTEGER#, adjust_amount = #record.adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, paid_amount = #record.paidAmount:DECIMAL#, reward_integration = #record.rewardIntegration:INTEGER#, receiver = #record.receiver:VARCHAR#, area_id = #record.areaId:BIGINT#, area_name = #record.areaName:VARCHAR#, detailed_address = #record.detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, zip_code = #record.zipCode:VARCHAR#, phone = #record.phone:VARCHAR#, if_invoice = #record.ifInvoice:INTEGER#, invoice_title = #record.invoiceTitle:VARCHAR#, tax = #record.tax:DECIMAL#, remark = #record.remark:VARCHAR#, payment_id = #record.paymentId:BIGINT#, delivery_id = #record.deliveryId:BIGINT#, member_id = #record.memberId:BIGINT#, coupon_id = #record.couponId:BIGINT#, is_push = #record.isPush:INTEGER#, push_time = #record.pushTime:TIMESTAMP#, delete_status = #record.deleteStatus:INTEGER#, order_status = #record.orderStatus:INTEGER#, order_amount = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#, payable_amount = #record.payableAmount:DECIMAL#, order_type = #record.orderType:INTEGER#, return_type = #record.returnType:INTEGER#, create_date = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#, verify_status = #record.verifyStatus:INTEGER#, invoice_type = #record.invoiceType:INTEGER#, finish_date = #record.finishDate:TIMESTAMP#, longitude = #record.longitude:VARCHAR#, latitude = #record.latitude:VARCHAR#, store_id = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#

update t_order
order_sn = #orderSn:VARCHAR#
order_source = #orderSource:INTEGER#
shipping_fee = #shippingFee:DECIMAL#
promotional_discount = #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#
coupon_discount = #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#
integration_discount = #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#
use_integration = #useIntegration:INTEGER#
adjust_amount = #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#
paid_amount = #paidAmount:DECIMAL#
reward_integration = #rewardIntegration:INTEGER#
receiver = #receiver:VARCHAR#
area_id = #areaId:BIGINT#
area_name = #areaName:VARCHAR#
detailed_address = #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#
zip_code = #zipCode:VARCHAR#
phone = #phone:VARCHAR#
if_invoice = #ifInvoice:INTEGER#
invoice_title = #invoiceTitle:VARCHAR#
tax = #tax:DECIMAL#
remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
payment_id = #paymentId:BIGINT#
delivery_id = #deliveryId:BIGINT#
member_id = #memberId:BIGINT#
coupon_id = #couponId:BIGINT#
is_push = #isPush:INTEGER#
push_time = #pushTime:TIMESTAMP#
delete_status = #deleteStatus:INTEGER#
order_status = #orderStatus:INTEGER#
order_amount = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#
payable_amount = #payableAmount:DECIMAL#
order_type = #orderType:INTEGER#
return_type = #returnType:INTEGER#
create_date = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#
verify_status = #verifyStatus:INTEGER#
invoice_type = #invoiceType:INTEGER#
finish_date = #finishDate:TIMESTAMP#
longitude = #longitude:VARCHAR#
latitude = #latitude:VARCHAR#
store_id = #storeId:VARCHAR#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update t_order set order_sn = #orderSn:VARCHAR#, order_source = #orderSource:INTEGER#, shipping_fee = #shippingFee:DECIMAL#, promotional_discount = #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, coupon_discount = #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, integration_discount = #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, use_integration = #useIntegration:INTEGER#, adjust_amount = #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, paid_amount = #paidAmount:DECIMAL#, reward_integration = #rewardIntegration:INTEGER#, receiver = #receiver:VARCHAR#, area_id = #areaId:BIGINT#, area_name = #areaName:VARCHAR#, detailed_address = #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, zip_code = #zipCode:VARCHAR#, phone = #phone:VARCHAR#, if_invoice = #ifInvoice:INTEGER#, invoice_title = #invoiceTitle:VARCHAR#, tax = #tax:DECIMAL#, remark = #remark:VARCHAR#, payment_id = #paymentId:BIGINT#, delivery_id = #deliveryId:BIGINT#, member_id = #memberId:BIGINT#, coupon_id = #couponId:BIGINT#, is_push = #isPush:INTEGER#, push_time = #pushTime:TIMESTAMP#, delete_status = #deleteStatus:INTEGER#, order_status = #orderStatus:INTEGER#, order_amount = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, payable_amount = #payableAmount:DECIMAL#, order_type = #orderType:INTEGER#, return_type = #returnType:INTEGER#, create_date = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, verify_status = #verifyStatus:INTEGER#, invoice_type = #invoiceType:INTEGER#, finish_date = #finishDate:TIMESTAMP#, longitude = #longitude:VARCHAR#, latitude = #latitude:VARCHAR#, store_id = #storeId:VARCHAR# where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
select id, order_sn, order_source, shipping_fee, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, paid_amount, reward_integration, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, zip_code, phone, if_invoice, invoice_title, tax, remark, payment_id, delivery_id, member_id, coupon_id, is_push, push_time, delete_status, order_status, order_amount, payable_amount, order_type, return_type, create_date, verify_status, invoice_type, finish_date, longitude, latitude, store_id from t_order
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

select * from (SELECT t.id, t.order_sn, t.order_source, t.remark, t.is_push, t.delete_status, t.order_status, t.payable_amount, t.order_type, t.create_date, d.`name` AS deliName, t.receiver, t.phone, t.delivery_id, t.verify_status verifyStatus, if(of.pay_method is null,p.`name`,of.pay_method) AS payName, concat(t.area_name,t.detailed_address) AS deliveryName, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.member_id,t1.member_id) AS memberid, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.real_name,t2.user_name) AS xiufenname, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.real_name,(select t6.real_name from t_leader t6 where t6.id = t1.leader_id)) AS lingxiuname FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN t_member t2 ON t.member_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_member_leader t1 ON t.member_id = t1.member_id LEFT JOIN t_leader t5 ON t.member_id = t5.member_id LEFT JOIN c_payment_way p on p.id=t.payment_id LEFT JOIN c_delivery_way d on d.id=t.delivery_id LEFT JOIN t_order_flow of on t.id = of.order_id ) t4 where t4.memberid is not null
t4.order_sn like '%$orderNo$%'
t4.lingxiuname like '%$memberName$%'
t4.order_source = #source#
t4.order_status = #orderStatus#
t4.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
t4.verifyStatus = #verifyStatus#
t4.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
t4.phone like '%$phone$%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t4.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #start_date# AND DATE_FORMAT(t4.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') <=#end_date#
order by t4.create_date desc
LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$

select count(*) from (SELECT t.id, t.order_sn, t.order_source, t.remark, t.is_push, t.delete_status, t.order_status, t.payable_amount, t.order_type, t.create_date, d.`name` AS deliName, t.receiver, t.phone, t.delivery_id, t.verify_status verifyStatus, if(of.pay_method is null,p.`name`,of.pay_method) AS payName, concat(t.area_name,t.detailed_address) AS deliveryName, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.member_id,t1.member_id) AS memberid, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.real_name,t2.user_name) AS xiufenname, if(t1.member_id is null,t5.real_name,(select t6.real_name from t_leader t6 where t6.id = t1.leader_id)) AS lingxiuname FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN t_member t2 ON t.member_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_member_leader t1 ON t.member_id = t1.member_id LEFT JOIN t_leader t5 ON t.member_id = t5.member_id LEFT JOIN c_payment_way p on p.id=t.payment_id LEFT JOIN c_delivery_way d on d.id=t.delivery_id LEFT JOIN t_order_flow of on t.id = of.order_id ) t4 where t4.memberid is not null
t4.order_sn like '%$orderNo$%'
t4.lingxiuname like '%$memberName$%'
t4.order_source = #source#
t4.order_status = #orderStatus#
t4.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
t4.verifyStatus = #verifyStatus#
t4.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
t4.phone like '%$phone$%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t4.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #start_date# AND DATE_FORMAT(t4.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') <=#end_date#

SELECT t.id, t.order_sn, t.order_source, t.remark, t.is_push, t.delete_status, t.order_status, t.payable_amount, t.order_type, t.create_date, d.`name` AS deliName, t.receiver, t.phone, m.user_name, m.mobile, t.verify_status verifyStatus, if(of.pay_method is null,p.`name`,of.pay_method) AS payName, if(t.coupon_id is null,'-1',(select co.`name` from t_coupon_card ca left join t_coupon co on ca.ticket_id = co.id where ca.id = t.coupon_id) ) AS couponName, concat(t.area_name,t.detailed_address) AS deliveryName FROM t_order t left JOIN c_payment_way p on p.id=t.payment_id left JOIN c_delivery_way d on d.id=t.delivery_id LEFT JOIN t_member m on m.id=t.member_id left join t_order_flow of on t.id = of.order_id where 1=1
t.order_sn like '%$orderNo$%'
m.user_name like '%$memberName$%'
t.order_source = #source#
t.order_status = #orderStatus#
t.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
t.verify_status = #verifyStatus#
t.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
t.phone like '%$phone$%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#start_date#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#end_date#,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by t.create_date desc
LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$

SELECT count(t.id) FROM t_order t left JOIN c_payment_way p on p.id=t.payment_id left JOIN c_delivery_way d on d.id=t.delivery_id LEFT JOIN t_member m on m.id=t.member_id left join t_order_flow of on t.id = of.order_id where 1=1
t.order_sn like '%$orderNo$%'
m.user_name like '%$memberName$%'
t.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
t.phone like '%$phone$%'
t.order_source = #source#
t.order_status = #orderStatus#
t.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
t.verify_status = #verifyStatus#
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#start_date#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#end_date#,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT t.order_source, date_format( t.create_date, #sdfStr# ) as riqi, SUM(t.order_amount) as price FROM t_order t WHERE date_format(t.create_date, #sdfStr#) <=#endDate# and date_format(t.create_date, #sdfStr#) >=#startDate#
t.order_status = #orderStatus#
t.verify_status = #verifyStatus#
t.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
GROUP BY t.order_source, date_format( t.create_date, #sdfStr# )

SELECT t.order_source, date_format( t.create_date, #sdfStr# ) as riqi, COUNT(*) as tongji FROM t_order t WHERE date_format(t.create_date, #sdfStr#) <=#endDate# and date_format(t.create_date, #sdfStr#) >=#startDate#
t.order_status = #orderStatus#
t.verify_status = #verifyStatus#
t.delivery_id = #deliveryId#
GROUP BY t.order_source, date_format( t.create_date, #sdfStr# )

SELECT t1.*, t2.*, t3.*, t4.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(t.order_amount) AS todayOrderAmount, COUNT(t.id) AS todayOrderCount, FORMAT( SUM(t.order_amount) / COUNT(t.id), 2 ) AS todayPCT FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #today# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #today# ) t1, ( SELECT SUM(t.order_amount) AS yesterdayOrderAmount, COUNT(t.id) AS yesterdayOrderCount, FORMAT( SUM(t.order_amount) / COUNT(t.id), 2 ) AS yesterdayPCT FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #yesterday# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #yesterday# ) t2, ( SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS todayPayCount FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #today# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #today# ) t3, ( SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS yesyterdayPayCount FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #yesterday# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #yesterday# ) t4

SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS todaySource, t.order_source AS today FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #today# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #today# GROUP BY t.order_source

SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS yesterdaySource, t.order_source AS yesterday FROM t_order t WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #yesterday# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #yesterday# GROUP BY t.order_source

SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS todayDelivery, cdw.`name` AS deliveryName, t.delivery_id FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN c_delivery_way cdw ON cdw.id = t.delivery_id WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #today# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #today# GROUP BY t.delivery_id

SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS yesterdayDelivery, cdw.`name` AS deliveryName, t.delivery_id FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN c_delivery_way cdw ON cdw.id = t.delivery_id WHERE t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #yesterday# AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #yesterday# GROUP BY t.delivery_id

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.order_amount),0) AS oa,IFNULL(COUNT(t.id),0) AS oc,DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM t_date_base tdb left JOIN t_order t ON DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.order_status IN (1, 2, 3) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str, '%Y-%m-%d') > #chartdate# AND DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #today# GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str, '%Y-%m-%d')
